result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Claude James Grant

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Claude James Grant not in court, in custody.  Attorney Corey R. Flynn in court for Claude James Grant.  Attorney Patrick O'Keefe in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for scheduling conference.  Defendant filed a prompt disposition request that expires on 12-25-2022.  Court set final pretrial and jury trial dates.  Defense acknowledges receipt of discovery.  Court ordered all substantive motions to be filed by the next court date.  Case adjourned to Branch 40.
Final pre-trial scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Jury trial scheduled for December 5, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Received and Filed:  Request for Prompt Disposition.

Defendant Claude James Grant appeared by video, in custody in Dodge Correctional.  Attorney Corey R. Flynn appeared by video for Claude James Grant.  Prosecuting attorney Abby Rockendorf in court in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Officer R. Matheus. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 40.
Scheduling conference scheduled for October 6, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Attorney Corey R. Flynn in court, defendant Claude James Grant not in court, in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. Mr Grant has been moved from HOC to Dodge. Due to the move he was not scheduled to appear by video for todays proceedings from Dodge. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 25, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Received and filed: Letter from defendant.  (Claude J. Grant - #2022003727, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).

Attorney Corey R. Flynn in court, defendant Claude James Grant not in court, in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. Due to Court congestion Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Corey R. Flynn in court, defendant Claude James Grant not in court, in custody.  Stephanie Krueger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
CASE HELD OFF THE RECORD PER JUDGE.  Case in court for a State v. Lee hearing.  Attorney Corey Flynn appointed as counsel by SPD's office.  Court scheduled a preliminary hearing.  Case adjourned to Branch PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed:  Attorney Corey Flynn
Letter from defendant re:  dismissal of this case.  (Claude J. Grant - #2022003727, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).
Due to the general felony intake calendar and the filing date of the criminal complaint, this matter is reassigned to Br. 40 Judge Shelton.

Defendant Claude James Grant not in court, defendant in custody.  Stephanie Krueger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a State V. Lee hearing in the trial court.  Hearing scheduled for June 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Claude James Grant not in court, defendant in custody.  John Daniel Flynn appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. SPD to appointe Attorney Corey Flynn. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Claude James Grant not in court, defendant in custody.  Samantha Raygo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for a Preliminary hearing. State's witness is present. SPD need more time to appoint counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 29, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.
No contact order signed and filed.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with 2000 block of N Cambridge Ave

Defendant Claude James Grant in court with attorney Edgar A Beltran.  Defendant Claude James Grant in custody.  Erin Michelle Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Claude James Grant appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Wagner, Branch 38.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 6, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
